title: pbe clossed?
body:
all the related pbe pages are marking error.
i want to check how much timel ill have to wait to get it but i cant because the list its crashed too. whats happening?

replies.body: Currently the [**pbe signups**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) are down for maintenance. We're working on trying to smooth out that signup process a bit and you can read and little more into why we're doing this on our post [**here**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/EGhTBUV6-pbe-signups-are-closed).
